ygData.subject: RE: shadow knight mid-level armor
ygData.msgSnippet: No, I mean, even as a DE I have always been KOS in MM, so i figured what the hell, and have spent a bit of time killing my own kind (hey, no one is safe from
ygData.messageBody:
No, I mean, even as a DE I have always been KOS in MM, so i figured what the
hell, and have spent a bit of time killing my own kind (hey, no one is safe
from me), So now I have to kill that high elf princess in HH to repair the
damage I have done.


Tesaar Grimm
Hand of Innoruuk
The Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 5:50 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] shadow knight mid-level armor


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

nono... ya dont kill stuff for the armor. that'd be lame.. since MM is one
of 2 places in all faydwer where evil folks can safely go. its a quest, ala
the crafted armor quest ;) and anybody who kills the quest critters while
i'm tryin to talk to em is gonna be hurtin'.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
